alert.note: Alert for Butte; Northern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:56PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Butte, northwestern Lawrence and central Crook Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 656 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles west of New Haven to 4 miles west of Warren Peak to 4 miles south of Sundance. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Sundance and Warren Peak around 705 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Cook Lake, Bear Lodge Campground, Aladdin and Beulah. This includes... Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 1 and 7. Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 179 and 207. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
